TEXT: Gain 2 LP on victory. You can use LP to upgrade Departments or use 5 LP to expand Departments. LP will persist during a run.
One day we got a question. Where did we come from?
Received a life to someone, and left unattended irresponsibly.
We were only to throw out despair and anger.
We will understand life and soul through our hands.
They set up a far high tower to go where they came.
There was no answer. They did not get what they wanted. They saw only the death of life.
The tower is touched by the sky, and nothing will remain on the ground.
Who pays for the pain and the price of deeds given in our life
We ate endlessly to live. Inevitable depletion, garbage...
Getting to know its taste was an unavoidable process.
We were able to live. We could continue eating.
They fought to eat each other..
The stronger survives. That is all.
To understand what is beyond comprehension, They see and dreaming.
They have not paid for understanding. Just do it.
Only weak actions were heard to us, and we sought mercy and love for them.
We can not understand them, nor they understand us.
We tried to accept it endlessly.
We wanted to understand them in our head whatever the consequences.
In order not to collapse oneself.
Because what they can't understand and what they can't reach is not acceptable...
Let's make a stronger fire in a life like a candle that will someday end!
We march every time and share our joy.
Abandon the old body and become all one,
and continues the red carnival constantly.
Someday everyone will know, and tomorrow we will march together.
When the night falls in the Backstreet, they will come.
When the sun raise up, there will be no remains anymore.
From minor chores to murder by contract,
they do anything you want once they have paycheck.
They are usually hired to the office, the syndicate, and the wings.
Their work range from mere chores to something sublime.
Patron by the Wings, Inventions from the backstreet,
Loots from the Outskirt, Artifacts from the Ruins...
They just overcome whatever's in front of them, with their weapons in hands,
just as they've done for a long time.
The colossal tower of light is called The Library.
It is natural for Fixers to be drawn to such a mystical place of life and death.
Book Hunters, who will rummage through the library ruled by Pale Librarian someday
They handle the secrets of the world.
That is the privilege and absolute power of the Head, the Eye, and The Claw.
None can stand against them. The story of the Nest will never end if they exist.
Active Ordeals(Ordeals will reward Tool Abnormality)
Clear PE and Abnormality unlock info, active after get Bucket (Warn: It's irreversible)

The HP bullet manufactured by the Nano Technology Agreement with K Corp will speed up recovery of the physical body.
Applies weakened Enkephalin to you. The carefully refined Enkephalin will heal the target’s mind without addiction.
Attaches a shield that absorbs physical attacks.
Attaches a shield that reduces the perception of the target, protecting it from spiritual attacks from the outside.
Attaches a shield that seals vulnerable openings of a human, including spiritual ones to prevent the erosion thorn from infiltrating deep into the target.
Reduces the movement speed of a target by overloading the Qliphoth control.
A bullet to remove unstable elements. Remove a low HP enemy.
Choose a special upgrade for Paradise Lost.
